segments.text: To a historic coffeehouse . It's got a little Mafia story to it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yeah , while he was eating , and he was a pretty famous Don .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Cool ! Is it safe for us to eat there though ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . In fact , nowadays , you'll see more tourists there than Italians . There are Mafia tours nowadays that go there to eat .
segments.speaker: S2
